tool_description: Detects and logs actual music usage on broadcast channels using the configured monitoring setup, providing detailed broadcast occurrence data with timestamps and channel information.

monitor_config_id.description: Monitor configuration ID from Broadcast Monitor Setup

detection_period_days.description: Number of days to run detection (1-90)

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for positive detection (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid config ID: Monitor configuration ID not found. Create configuration using Broadcast Monitor Setup first.
Invalid detection period: Period must be between 1-90 days.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
usage: Provide monitor_config_id from Broadcast Monitor Setup and specify detection_period_days. Optionally adjust confidence_threshold for detection sensitivity.

total_detections.description: Total number of music usage detections found

detection_details.description: Array of detailed detection records with timestamps and channels

coverage_summary.description: Summary of monitoring coverage and performance
